pkgmetadata.longdescription: Convert Tibbles or Data Frames to Xts Easily // Facilitate the movement between data frames to 'xts'. Particularly useful when moving from 'tidyverse' to the widely used 'xts' package, which is the input format of choice to various other packages. It also allows the user to use a 'spread_by' argument for a character column 'xts' conversion.
